name: Tiny Legend
description:
A tiny legend.

Best played on gamepad:

  • Left Stick: Move
  • A: Jump
  • X: Interact
  • B: Swing Sword
  • Right Trigger: Run
  • Left Trigger: Use Shield

If you must play on keyboard

  • Arrow Keys: Move
  • Up Arrow: Jump
  • Space: Interact
  • X: Swing Sword
  • Z: Run
  • C: Use Shield

A project by jelch, with music by Simultannihilator
